scripts.copy-files: cp -r lang dist/lang && cp bin/hs dist/bin/hs && cp bin/hscms dist/bin/hscms
scripts.test-docker: yarn build-docker && docker container run -it --rm --name=hs-cli-container hs-cli-image yarn test
scripts.build-docker: docker image build --tag hs-cli-image . && docker image prune -f
scripts.check-main: branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD) && [ $branch = main ] || (echo 'Error: New release can only be published on main branch' && exit 1)
scripts.pub: yarn build && cd dist && npm publish --dry-run --tag latest
scripts.release:major: yarn check-main && yarn version --major && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:minor: yarn check-main && yarn version --minor && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.release:patch: yarn check-main && yarn version --patch && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.prerelease:major: yarn check-main && yarn version --premajor --preid=experimental && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.prerelease:minor: yarn check-main && yarn version --preminor --preid=experimental && yarn pub && yarn push
scripts.prerelease:patch: yarn check-main && yarn version --prepatch --preid=experimental && yarn pub && yarn push
